item.title: Windows Infrastructure
item.description: 7.1 Windows Infrastructure The following deployment diagram shows the use of DokChess on Windows without an opening book. Arena is used as an example frontend (â†’ Decison 9.1 “How does the engine communicate with the outside world?”). Fig.: Deploying DokChess on a Windows PC Software Requirements on a PC: Java Runtime Environment SE 11 (or higher) The JVM (javaw.exe) is in the PATH, otherwise adapt dokchess.bat Arena DokChess.jar contains the compiled Java source code of all the modules and all the necessary dependencies (“Uber-jar”).
